meanings.definition: Psilocins: a hallucinogenic compound found in certain mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the effects of psilocins on the brain.
meanings.sent2: People should be cautious when consuming mushrooms containing psilocins.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf accidentally sprinkled psilocins on the wrong mushrooms!
meanings.sent4: Her mind danced with colorful visions after ingesting psilocins.
meanings.sent5: The forest seemed alive and vibrant under the influence of psilocins.

meanings.definition: Psilocins: the active ingredient in psychedelic mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: Psilocins are what give psychedelic mushrooms their unique properties.
meanings.sent2: Some researchers are exploring the therapeutic potential of psilocins.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added a dash of psilocins to the mushroom soup!
meanings.sent4: His thoughts swirled like a whirlpool after consuming psilocins.
meanings.sent5: The artist's creativity soared under the influence of psilocins.
